Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.name: generateHash(password:salt:N:r:p:length:)
Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.abstract: Generates Scrypt hash for given password and salt

Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.name: generateHash(passwordData:salt:N:r:p:length:)
Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.abstract: Generates Scrypt hash for given password and salt

Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.name: generateHash(password:N:r:p:)
Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.abstract: Generates Scrypt mfc string hash for given password. It generates random salt with default length of 16 bytes.

Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV3mcf1N1.name: mcf(N:r:p:salt:hash:)
Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV3mcf1N1.abstract: Converts hash data into MFC format for storage

Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.name: generateSalt(length:)
Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV12gener.abstract: Generates random salt of length bytes. Uses /dev/urandom/

Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV5check3.name: check(mcf:password:)
Structs/Scrypt.html#/s:6ScryptAAV5check3.abstract: Verifies given hash data in MFC format against password

Structs/Scrypt.html.name: Scrypt
Structs/Scrypt.html.abstract: Scrypt Swift wrapper utility for hashing password
